text: Allie Creek is a stream in northeastern Bollinger and northwestern Cape Girardeau counties of southeast Missouri. The stream headwaters are in Bollinger County north of Lixville at and the stream flows east to its confluence with the South Fork Apple Creek in the northwest corner of Cape Girardeau County at north of Hilderbrand.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1998, First edition, p. 58 Allie Creek most likely has the name of the female relative of a pioneer settler. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Bollinger County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Cape Girardeau County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Allie Creek
